name: Parkour Patrick
description:
You play as Parkour Patrick and you must find all 15 other green people.

NOTE: this game is crap so there is no win screen or anything.  

Oh and this only has 4 colors witch is fun... I guess?

How to play? Up is to jump there is a 2nd jump that has a  jump height dependint on you speed you can't do a 2nd jump when walking down somthing. (You can also climb) And to glide press down! 

I think that one green person is not possible ro get to so just make that 14 I guess! EDIT: WOW I DID IT YOU CAN DO 15! VERY HARD
